mapper.select:
select serialNumber from `tt_borders`
AND testerName = #{testerName} AND testStatus ='Repaired'
AND boardType = #{boardType}
and DATE_FORMAT(testTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{dStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(testTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{dEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
